segments.text: ... The rings please . May this ring be blessed so he who gives it and she who wears it may abide in peace , and continue in love until life ’ s end .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: With this ring I thee wed . Wear it as a symbol of our love and commitment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Honey , that ’ s my pinkie . The ring goes on the ring finger !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Umm ... that ’ s the thumb , Nick .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , Okay , I got it ! This is the ring finger !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s my middle finger , Nick . This is my ring finger !
segments.speaker: S1
